description: Hybrid application for full planning permission for the conversion and extension of the existing farmhouse and conversion of the existing stable buildings on the site to provide 8 flats and outline planning permission for the demolition of other buildings on the site and redevelopment to provide up to an additional 56 flats in three detached blocks with associated parking; landscaping and children's play area; and provision of approximately 7,000 square metre landscaped extension to the Northolt and Greenford Countryside Park incorporating a fifth conical mound, foot/cycle bridge and surface crossing over Kensington Road. (All outline application matters reserved)
